definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents.
sentences.chinese: 不滿者的嫉妒，是成功的溫度計。

sentences.english: Thermometers are filled with pentane or alcohol .
sentences.chinese: 溫度計盛有戊烷或酒精。

sentences.english: Such instruments as (are) thermometers and barometers can be found in any physics laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 象溫度計和氣壓計之類的儀器在任何實驗室都能找到。

sentences.english: This thermometer is calibrated by centigrade.
sentences.chinese: 這種溫度計是用攝氏百分度標定的。

sentences.english: We provide thermometers here to take your temperature.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有溫度計，可以給您先測一下體溫。

sentences.english: Thermometer or liquid level measuring instrument .
sentences.chinese: 溫度計或液麪測量儀表。

sentences.english: The thermometer is an Italian invention.
sentences.chinese: 溫度計是意大利人發明的。

sentences.english: Please put this thermometer under your armpit and let me feel your pulse.
sentences.chinese: 將溫度計放在腋窩裏面，用胳肢窩夾住它。

sentences.english: Let me have your temperature, put this thermometer under your armpit.
sentences.chinese: 我給你量體溫，把溫度計放到腋窩下。

sentences.english: The thermometer showed thirteen degrees below zero.
sentences.chinese: 溫度計指示零下三十度。

sentences.english: A meat thermometer must be used to determine the meat\\\'s safety and doneness.
sentences.chinese: 使用食物溫度計確定肉是否安全和已熟。

sentences.english: A new type of surface pyrometer is put up.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種表面溫度計的新設計原理。

sentences.english: The mercury dived to twelve below zero.
sentences.chinese: 溫度計的水銀柱驟然下降到零下十二度。

sentences.english: Ear thermometers are very accurate but expensive.
sentences.chinese: 耳溫度計最爲精確，然而也是最貴的。
